Lc0

Lc0 is a UCI-compliant chess engine designed to play chess via
neural network, specifically those of the LeelaChessZero project
(https://lczero.org).

To use the alternative lc0-mklml.exe version you will need the dll
files from the mklml distribution that can be downloaded from:
https://github.com/intel/mkl-dnn/releases
